des:
职位描述：1.负责移动混合APP相关技术的设计和开发；2.基于WebView进行跨平台HTML5开发，可编写可复用的用户界面组件；3.对最终用户体验负责，协助解决开发中的技术难题；4.与各端工程师一起研讨设计，提供前端框架技术方案； 
5.良好的沟通能力及项目问题处理能力。任职条件：1.使用较大型前端开发框架（如React，Vue，AngularJS…）的经验2.热衷学习与自我修炼，喜欢阅读英文原版技术文档和书籍；3.精通HTML/CSS/Javascript等前端技术，能轻松写出符合W3C标准、兼容主流浏览器的代码；4.思路清晰，有独立解决问题的能力；也有在软件开发团队中工作的经验与沟通协作能力。5.对前端框架设计有一定见解，可构建高性能的 Web 应用程序。6.大学专科以上学历，计算机、数学等相关专业毕业（或者计算机基础非常扎实）；公司福利：1.正式入职即办理五险一金，每年节日礼物，定期组织聚餐、旅游。2.提供具有行业竞争力的薪酬，薪酬依据能力而定，不封顶不设限。3.提供专业培训机会，通过持续在特定领域实践，注重个人能力的培养。4.持续不断的奖金，每年均有专项奖金丰厚的年终奖，专业工作需要成就感。6.我们了解工程师文化，拒绝技术官僚，倡导人性化管理，我们知道您需要的：咖啡、零食、弹性工作时间、加班餐、打车费…. 你懂的！公司期待您的加入！

company.name: 上海掌小门教育科技有限公司

title: 前端开发程序员（全栈）
address: 上海-徐汇区-漕宝路-桂箐路7号G7园区3号楼3楼
des:
Uplay PC is Ubisoft’s 1st party platform for PC games. Our mission is to bring our gaming experience to our players around the world, adapting it to local specifications when needed. We are now working on developing and deploying a local environment in China. This will require the Uplay PC team to have local presence to be able to deliver and maintain the best service to our Chinese players. 
 
As a part of the team, you would be responsible to deliver the new web experience of Uplay PC, using a wide spectrum of technologies ranging from C# on the server to TypeScript, HTML and SCSS on the UI side. 
 
You will join a multi-disciplinary team where everyone is willing to expand their knowledge and are encouraged to continue learning new things. The team is characterized by passion, comradery and the love for pc gaming. You will work in close collaboration with the other programmers, designers and testers with the opportunity to visit and work from collaborating studios. 
 
This job will require that the person goes to Sweden in the beginning and works with the team for 1-3 months. 
 
Responsibilities: 
Write clear, modular and maintainable code 
Participate in or lead feature task forces for technical design and implementation/improvement of new features. 
Testing, debugging, profiling and maintaining existing code, including the Uplay PC back office self-service portal. 
Develop and maintain new public-facing web applications, shown in the Uplay PC client and on the web, using Vue.js for the client-side application and ASP.NET Core Web API server side. 
 
You as a person: 
We believe to succeed in this role you’re a result focused person, who is passionate about developing platform software for games with millions of users. Furthermore, you believe in team ownership of what you craft and will be working with your colleagues to learn, share ideas and solve complex problems. 
 
QUALIFICATIONS 
Excellent C#, JavaScript (TypeScript), CSS and HTML skills. 
3+ years of professional programming experience. 
Bonus: Vue.js, ASP.NET Web API, .NET Core, AWS, ElasticSearch, Protocol Buffers, Continuous Integration.
